doc.title: Broadsword Exercise on the Battleship Texas
doc.plot: "Our films are made up of uncommon subjects, as you can readily see by the titles and descriptions. This one is a novelty. The men are seen at broadsword exercise, and, although they were not called upon in the late war to fight at close quarters, bringing their broadswords into play, yet they are drilled regularly, and are always prepared should the emergency arise. A beautiful picture."
